programme.desc: A blind date program hosted by Meng Fei. Participants will join a blind date with their parents, to explore the topics of love and marriage. The difference of value of marriage between two generations will be shown.

programme.title: Tour With Classics A Poetic Journey In China Ep8
programme.desc: Taking the poetry and geography as a clue, the program explores the poetic landscapes, traditional buildings, and humanity depicted in the Chinese classic poems. Lets take the poetry as a window to understand China.

programme.title: The Culture Sit-down with Wang Xiaohui Season 2 Ep1
programme.desc: From the perspective of the host Wang Xiao Hui, Chinese culture is interpreted through social phenomena and popular cultural topics by visiting and interviewing in the program.

programme.desc: Documentaries about four different topics of Hometown, Coordinates, Answering and Pursing Dream, which shows the changes of population migration, the relationship between people and the city, generation and connection.

They will have conversation with the female guests through the "second scene". All guests by two-way choice get to decide if they are the right persons to couple up.

programme.title: Camping Life Season 2 Ep13
programme.desc: The initiator William Chan invited his friends, Wei Daxun, Lil Ghost, Di Yang, Yin Zheng & Zhang Yanqi, to complete 5 themed camps with building different kind of ideal life portraits.

programme.title: Travel through Jiangsu Season 2 Ep11
programme.desc: Travel around the scenic spots and historic sites and the streets and alleys of the whole province of Jiangsu, look for historians, scholars, folk artisans, etc., explore a glimpse of what traditional Chinese culture and discover the unique charm of Jiangsu.

programme.title: Student Ep1
programme.desc: A tailor-made variety show for students. 12 students from different countries and subjects are invited in each episode to discuss various topics. Hosts include Ken Lin, Nadow Lin, and Amber An.

programme.title: Camping Life Season 2 Ep13
programme.desc: The initiator William Chan invited his friends, Wei Daxun, Lil Ghost, Di Yang, Yin Zheng & Zhang Yanqi, to complete 5 themed camps with building different kind of ideal life portraits.

programme.title: The Talent Season 2 Ep3
programme.desc: The first Gen Z competition reality show - 12 teenagers were selected to join the "Tsing Pek Summer Camp" and test their problem-solving skills. Xie Nan, Jiang Changjian, and Wei Kunlin (Dr. Wei) were formed as a guardian group, together with Ding Ruoxu, Leo Li, Jay Song, etc. who jointly escort the players on the "Ling-guang Island Tour".

programme.title: Super Mom Ep1
programme.desc: Mums and experts are invited to share their personal experiences and interpretation on parenting. The program aims to relieve the anxiety of parents by providing the latest, most comprehensive and sincere parenting information.

programme.title: An Exciting Offer Season 4 Ep23
programme.desc: The reality show of this season is to focus 10 young architectural interns to work in Beijing Institute of Architectural Design for a month. ChunYe Zhang, Nicholas Tse, Jason Zhang, Xueqin Li, Gabrielle Guan, etc. formed as cheer up team to witness their passionate growth process.

programme.title: Across the Strait Ep29
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Governments policy of one country, two systems in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmens understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep339340
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep47974798
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1884
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3750
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep47994800
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep981
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep343344
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep47994800
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2145
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep48004801
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep345346
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2146
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep191
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: Directed by renowned director Zhang Yimou, the film is set during the Cultural Revolution, where a common man escapes a labour camp to find a newsreel that captures his daughter for one second in a movie. On the way, he encounters an orphan who also seeks the movie reel. Can the man finally pass the reel to a projectionist and screen the movie?

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When massive layoffs are expected, four middle-aged men pledge their loyalty to the company by joining the newly formed dragon boat team. As the four embark on their rigorous training, they are forced to face their respective mid-life issues. The process rekindles their long-lost fighting spirit, and they begin to welcome lifes challenges.

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: Ming is transferred to do menial police work ten months after the murder of Yan, in 2004. Meanwhile, a new star, Wing, has emerged in the police force and Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: Echoes of the Thunder
programme.desc: Two half-brothers, Nam and Fire, are top racing drivers. In a racing challenge with Japanese driver Kenji, Nam causes a young racing driver to be seriously injured and is depressed. Fire stands up for Nam and decides to compete with Kenji in an illegal street car race. Who will win the race? Can Nam finally bounce back?

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kongs toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Let It Ghost
programme.desc: The movie consists of three urban ghost stories: when a film crew is haunted by a ghost, the director decides to cast her to play the ghost; when a taxi driver takes his girlfriend to a staycation, a horny ghost adds spice to it; a wandering child ghost refuses to leave a mall that is to be demolished, so the tenants help her to move on.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say yes?

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: When circus clown Sunny gets transformed into a super-powered mutant, he finds himself pitted against his fellow circus performers who were altered in the same accident, and who are now using their powers to wreak havoc around the city.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: Corruption was rampant in the Hong Kong Police Force in the early 1970s. Chief Inspector Lak launders drug money with three other police officers, and a young officer from the newly established Independent Commission Against Corruption division is determined to bring them down.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Henry Chen, a former soldier, is recruited for his toughest mission yet - teaching a class of teen delinquents. As he kicks his way into their school and home lives, it becomes clear that his unconventional teaching style might be just what they need.

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartels turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brothers hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over the death of her young son by becoming a foster parent. For 13 years, Meis dedication to the foster child leads her to neglect her husband and the true needs of the child. It is only through the childs unintentional help that the couple finally manages to salvage their relationship.

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: First Love the Litter on the Breeze
programme.desc: This movie is the directorial debut of actor Eric Kot for Wong Kar Wai. Eric features the topic of first love in his first movie: a sleepwalker guided through the night by a lonely admirer is bizarre yet romantic, while a married grocer facing the vengeful first love that he once rejected is heartbreaking.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: The Way We Are
programme.desc: Set in Tin Shui Wai, a marginalised satellite town, Kwai is a middle-aged widow who works hard in a neighbourhood supermarket to support herself and her son. They lead a mundane but fulfilling life. When an elderly woman who lives alone moved in to Tin Shui Wai, Kwai strikes up a friendship with her and helps her ease into a new life.

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: ambushing a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency and send it to a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: The Web Of Death
programme.desc: To rule the martial arts world, the Head of the Snake Sect seeks to possess a deadly plant called Five Poison Web, spreading rumours on its whereabouts. Brothers Xiong and Kit are sent to investigate. Xiong falls in love with Su who has a clue of where the plant is, but she accidentally hurts Kit when seeking the plant, devastating Xiong.

programme.title: Whose Baby Is In The Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls high school, is stuck with a baby that isnt his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: What Price Honesty
programme.desc: In this period martial arts thriller, three police graduates are assigned to a town rife with crimes and corruption. They vow to uphold justice but are hampered by their corrupt superior, resulting in them putting their lives and the lives of their beloved in danger.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him

programme.title: Ode To Gallantry
programme.desc: In this surprisingly light-hearted "Venoms" martial arts adventure, a lone wanderer is repeatedly mistaken for someone else and drawn into a number of violent battles.

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: Clans Of Intrigue
programme.desc: One day, when the heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, Gong from the Holy Water Palace accuses Chu of stealing the holy water and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove him innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keepers daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: The Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: Fans of the international star Alexander Fu Sheng were aghast. Their idol had broken both his legs and was recuperating. Everyone wondered: would he be able to return to the action comedies for which he was so famous? This movie was the answer, and it left no doubt that he had made a full recovery. Liu Chia-yung, brother of preeminent martial arts moviemaker Liu Chia-liang, was famous in his own right for kung-fu comedies, and he out-did himself with this one. Imagine Bob Hope and Bing Crosby with the skills of Jet Li and Jackie Chan, and youve got an idea of the fun and fury inherent in this delightful tale of two con men vying for a horde of hidden gold. Add to the mix a Shaolin monk (played by "Master Killer" Gordon Liu Chia-hui), a powerfully brutal villain, and his equally dangerous mute sister (future director Yang Tsing-tsing), and youve got one of the most internationally loved kung-fu capers ever made.

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sings wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his familys declining status. Lin visits his fiance before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lins bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: Fangs Of The Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: Swordswomen Three
programme.desc: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon could be called "Swordswomen Two." Three decades earlier, Shen Yi, Essie Lin Chia, and Pan Ying-tzu took on Shaw's first international superstar, Lo Lieh for the Han Family Sword - making this a four-star treat for action fans.

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: Holy Flame Of The Martial World
programme.desc: This internationally popular tale of a brother and sister, seeking vengeance for the death of their parents through using the mythical yin/yang Holy Flame kung-fu technique. It's an outstanding epic choreographed and co-starring lead "Venom" Kuo Chue (aka. Philip Kwok).

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: Rivals Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: Shen and Wong Fei Hungs relationship turns sour, and Shen frames Wong and his disciple for murder. They are saved by a businessman Zhou, but Wong must win the Lion Dance Trophy to return Zhous favour. Can Wong Fei Hung defeat all skilled martial artists and complete his mission?

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: Disciples Of The 36Th Chamber
programme.desc: In the finale of this trilogy, Gordon Liu reprises his famous role, Monk San Te, as he tries to protect Fang Shih Yu, an arrogant youth who gets into trouble with the Qing officials, and nearly lands Shaolin Temple into trouble too.

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: Na Cha The Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend Investiture of the Gods, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: The Imperial Swordsman
programme.desc: Fu is a government officer heading home after being charged with falsifying reports. En route, he encounters & recruits a skilled swordsman as a bodyguard. They then meet a fleeing bride and her maid who asked to join them for protection. When the group reach a ruined temple however, a gang of assassins appear and attack them

programme.title: A Deadly Secret
programme.desc: A corrupt magistrate, obsessed with finding a hidden treasure, jails and tortures his daughter's lover and buries his daughter alive! Ironically, it is in her coffin that the secret to the hidden treasure is found, setting off a frenzy of destruction.

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zangs journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: Twin Blades Of Doom
programme.desc: A retired martial artist is forced to return with a vengeance after his family and friends are murdered by the evil Ghost Gang. He decides to challenge the gangs leader to a deadly duel so as to take revenge. Can he defeat the ruthless leader in the end?

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy House of 72 tenants, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Lady Assassin
programme.desc: Two feuding princes fight for the throne in the Qing Dynasty, causing many injuries and deaths to the commoners. Can the lady assassin who is drawn into this royal feud execute her assassination mission in time to help one of the princes secure the throne?

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Dong and Chu plan to get married but their families who are lifelong rivals, disapproved. They decide to fake suicide and eventually get both of their parents to settle their differences and approve the marriage. Concurrently, a record company announces that they will release Dongs songs, leading to double bliss for the couple.

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fianc. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his peoples livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: 7-Man Army
programme.desc: This iconoclastic film retells the legend of seven Chinese patriots, who sacrificed their lives to defend against 20,000 Japanese soldiers and 50 tanks for 5 days, at a strategic key point of the Great Wall known as Pa Tou Lou Tzu.

programme.title: Gorilla
programme.desc: Tamil Thriller Comedy Film, Starring, Jiiva, Shalini Pandey, Kong, Yogi Babu, Radha Ravi, Sathish, Rajendran, Vivek Prasanna, Madhan, and Ramdoss

programme.title: Tuck Jagadish
programme.desc: Action Film, starring Nani, Ritu Varma and Jagapathi Babu

programme.title: Thirunaal
programme.desc: Tamil Action Romantic Movie, Starring, Jiiva, Nayanatara, Gopinath, Meenakshi,Sharath

programme.title: Mohini
programme.desc: Tamil horror thriller film, Starring, Trisha Krishnan, Jackky Bhagnani, Yogi Babu, Ganeshkar, Jangiri Madhumitha & Others

programme.title: Enna Solla Pogirai
programme.desc: Tamil Romance Film, Starring, Teju Ashwini, Delhi Ganesh, Ashwin Kumar Lakshmikanthan, Avantika Mishra

programme.title: Theeni
programme.desc: romantic comedy movie starring Ashok Selvan, Ritu Varma and Nithya Menen

programme.title: Rajini Murugan
programme.desc: Tamil Film, Starring, Sivakarthikeyan, Keerthi Suresh, Soori & Others

programme.title: Malaysia To Amnesia
programme.desc: Tamil Comedy Film, starring M. S. Bhaskar, Vaibhav Reddy, Karunakaran & Others

programme.title: Bothaya Viduda
programme.desc: Tamil Comedy thriller film, starring - Sri simha, Satya, Naresh Agastya & Athulya Chandra

programme.title: En Swasa Katre

programme.title: Red Riding Hood
programme.desc: Valerie is a beautiful young woman torn between two men. She is in love with a brooding outsider Peter, but her parents have arranged for her to marry the wealthy Henry. Unwilling to lose each other, Valerie and Peter are planning to run away together when they learn that Valerie's older sister has been killed by the werewolf that prowls the dark forest surrounding their village. Father Solomon, a famous werewolf hunter, warns that the wolf, who takes human form by day, could be any one of them. As the death toll rises with each moon, Valerie begins to suspect that the werewolf could be someone she loves. Panic grips the town as Valerie discovers that she has a unique connection to the beast.

programme.title: In The Heart Of The Sea
programme.desc: Oscar winner Ron Howard (A Beautiful Mind) directs the action adventure based on the best-selling book about the dramatic true journey of the whaling ship Essex. In the winter of 1820, the New England whaling vessel Essex was assaulted by something no one could believe: a whale of mammoth size and will, and an almost human sense of vengeance. The real-life maritime disaster would inspire Herman Melville's Moby Dick. But that told only half the story. In The Heart of The Sea reveals the encounter's harrowing aftermath, as the ship's surviving crew is pushed to their limits and forced to do the unthinkable to stay alive. Braving storms, starvation, panic and despair, the men will call into question their deepest beliefs, from the value of their lives to the morality of their trade, as their captain searches for direction on the open sea and his first mate (The Avengers' Chris Hemsworth) still seeks to bring the great whale down.

programme.title: Wild Oman: Wonder of Arabia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Sultanate of Oman is the Middle East's best kept secret. It is a corner of Arabia of unparalleled beauty and unexpected landscapes. It's a land swept by incredible winds that nourish some of the most productive ecosystems of our planet inhabited by extraordinary creatures and some of the rarest animals of our Planet - the Arabian Sea Humpback Whale, Loggerhead Turtle and Arabian Wolf - as well as other incredible species such as the Arabian Chameleon, Caracal and Egyptian Vulture.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Commander - Volcano expert Chris Horsley returns to the Congo to investigate a potentially lethal threat to over two-million people. programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep7
programme.desc: Boots - Gregg Wallace visits a boot factory in Wollaston, Northamptonshire to follow the production of a pair of Dr. Martens, while Cherry Healey gets to grips with the machines that make shoelaces.

programme.title: Spy in the Ocean S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Deep Trouble - The Ocean is a beautiful and mysterious place but as our Spies discover, trouble can lie just below the surface.

programme.title: South Korea with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In the final leg of his journey Alexander visits Busan, a coastal port and South Korea's second biggest city. He takes in a visit to a shaman, and climbs up Sunrise Peak, a UNESCO world heritage site.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S11 Ep2
programme.desc: Like Ghosts - The Hailstones produce an original work of Inupiaq art, and Cole Sturgis ventures into the wilds of the Southeast on a life-or-death hunt.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Extreme Australia, South Australia and Victoria - Robson gets in with the locals to track down a beautiful fish known locally as 'reds', and tries his hand on a huge fishing trawler.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - How Smart Are Sharks? Ep4
programme.desc: Often portrayed as mindless eating machines prone to attacking humans, sharks are more complex and intelligent than previously thought. Find out how these graceful top predators interact, choose friends, and even teach other sharks.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Waterhole Ep1
programme.desc: Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badgers risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 - The Last Desert Giants Ep3
programme.desc: The Namib is the oldest desert in the world, hugging Africas shoreline for over 400 kilometers. It is one of the most inhospitable habitats on earth. Yet the worlds largest land mammal has made a home here, adapted through behavior and designed to life in the extreme.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Magicians of the Reef Ep2
programme.desc: Arabias coral reefs are home to some of natures most impressive illusionists. Creatures can pulsate with colour, transform in the blink of an eye, or perform riveting displays of showmanship. Because in these dangerous waters, disguise is crucial.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Island Feast Ep3
programme.desc: Off the coast of Oman, summer weather drives nutrients in from the ocean depths where they meet the Arabian sun, causing an explosion of life. Smaller fish spawn, filling the waters with eggs. This creates a buffet predators just cant resist.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Cold-Blooded Killers Ep4
programme.desc: From our point of view, cold-blooded predators are brutal, savvy, programmed killers. But from their point of view, its just another day at the butchers counter. These are some of the most fearsome predators on Earth.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 - Utah Ep4
programme.desc: A diverse trek through the remote and surprising canyonlands of southern Utah reveals soaring cliff walls, forested plateaus, and breathtaking gorges. Snow-capped mountains ring natural bridges, arches, and stunning rock formations eroded by time.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - The Domino Effect Ep1
programme.desc: Witness some big changes when four cute new arrivals join the nursery classes. And for a handful of adolescent males that are growing too big and boisterous for their babysitters, its their last day at forest school.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Chasing Mako Ep3
programme.desc: In some of the most-remote regions on the planet, researchers dive deep and brave danger to unlock secret shark behaviours, challenge myths about sharks, and fight for the protection of these supreme predators before its too late.

programme.desc: Staying alive is job one for these masters of defence. With clever adaptations like mimicry and poison on their side, they continue to outwit predators.

programme.desc: Why do zebras have stripes? How do penguins see underwater? And why are a tree frogs eyes red? In this exploration of sight, discover how some animals have evolved to see extremely well while others have evolved to be nearly invisible.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 - Arizona Ep5
programme.desc: Epic natural wonders are uncovered in the remote desert of the American southwest. From sweeping canyons bound by towering cliffs to fossilized dunes striped in desert red, the Paria Plateau is a geological marvel.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Dillas Surprise Ep2
programme.desc: Crash a fruit-flinging party celebrating the return of Jelapat, Talaken, Bawan, and Rona to the nursery to join the rest of their classmates. Meanwhile, flooding overtakes the pre-release islands, and injuries stifle the progress of two students.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Wild Coast Ep2
programme.desc: Go up against Australias wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroos deadly boxing moves and the redback spiders precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 - Crowded Islands Ep4
programme.desc: On rocky islands off the coast of South Africa, thousands of creatures congregate to breed. Among these, huge colonies of cape gannets dominate. Surrounded by rich waters, they can find enough to feed themselves and their young. But life is full of challenges for the breeding gannets...

programme.desc: Social Animals - Cooperation comes in many forms. Some animals cooperate to be social while others put the welfare of the group above their own reproductive potential. See the many ways species have evolved to work with one another in order to survive.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Bahamas - With more than one million acres of National Parks, the islands of the Bahamas are a haven for the migratory birds, green turtles, and rock iguanas that find sanctuary in the archipelagos sandstone cliffs, underwater caves, and pink-sand beaches.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Kesi Turns a Corner - Watch a milestone moment when two students get their first forest time in years. And another pair of students are confined to the schools clinic after an accident in the forest leaves Beni with a broken leg and Lala with a broken elbow.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn - An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Return to the Wild - The Eastern Cape Province is investing heavily in ecotourism and conservation as an alternative to fishing and commercial development. The region is reclaiming farmlands and closing fishing grounds for wildlife. This is one of the most exciting conservation success stories in Africa.

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep44
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Brick - Noddy and his friends are building a toy tower. Carlton is joining in and having a great time. They've almost finished when one of the brick pieces goes missing! Oh no. How can they finish the tower without the last brick? Noddy needs to investigate. Using his detecting skills Noddy soon finds the missing brick. But when he gets back to the Toy Green to finish the tower, he discovers that another brick has gone missing! What's going on? This investigation is really complicated! Noddy works out that the bricks were taken by Carlton. The big cat admits that he was having so much fun playing that he didn't want the game to end! Everyone forgives him and they decide to carry on playing all afternoon, all thanks to Noddy! Well done!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep44
programme.desc: Why Buffalo Has Horns - You see there was a time when Buffalo didn't have horns. He had very long shaggy hair and he lived near the Swamp. But then one day the Swamp moves and Buffalo has to find a new home! The Swamp grows and grows and soon all the horned animals who live on the Plains risk losing their home too. So Buffalo decides to save the day and push back the muddy swamp. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep44
programme.desc: Brassless Bandfinal - The brass band booked for the Silver Hatch parade have cancelled. Mr Carburettor will be furious if he doesn't have music at his parade. Roary and his friends think up an ingenious plan...

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep18
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Loch Ness Monster - Mrs Goggins is on holiday, so Sarah Gilbertson is looking after her dog Bonnie. She calls in on Pat and proves she has zero control over the dog. But there is only time for Jess to roll his eyes before Pat is called out on a special delivery - it's urgent! He has to deliver the RADARSCOPE (designed by Ted) to Mrs Goggins, who is up in Scotland! Pat has no idea what a radarscope is and neither does Ben. But they know what urgent means, so they spring into action and load it into Pat's jet plane. Back in Greendale Bonnie gives Sarah the slip, and PC Selby becomes embroiled in an escalating search... up in Scotland meanwhile, Pat lands but doesn't even get an explanation of the radarscope as time is pressing, and he, Jess, and their technological bit of kit are bundled into a boat and they set out over the loch... Loch Ness! While the search for mischievous Bonnie intensifies back home, Pat realizes they are searching for a creature of their own - the Loch Ness Monster!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep4
programme.desc: Where There's Smoke - After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep30
programme.desc: Wings - Ton-Ton's dreams come true when the Trux build hang-gliding wings to rescue the Ottos, but when he crashes it's up to Dozer to fly the rescue mission

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep30
programme.desc: Disappearing Act/Sting Of Justice - When a bad magic trick makes Chet disappear, Turbo and Burn work together to find him; A superhero hornet arrives in Turbotown and stirs up trouble.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep30
programme.desc: Chercophonie / Oh, Man, And The Sea - Tip becomes a Boovsland rock icon due to her awful guitar playing; When Donny takes Oh fishing, they battle a giant Sturgeon

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep13
programme.desc: Lucky And The Price Of Freedom - Grayson wrangles Spirit "fair and square" and sends him to auction in another town --and there is nothing Lucky can do to stop him!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep14
programme.desc: Lucky And The Long Way Home - Spirit and Lucky desperately try to find a way back to one another.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep8
programme.desc: Mom Genes - When Grug takes Ugga hunting to find her inner growl again, she's as fierce as ever until coming face-to-face with a mom and baby too cute to catch.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep10
programme.desc: Night Of The Living Croods / Spoonful Of Soo-Gar - When The Croods experience the first-ever sugar-rush, they're hooked on the delicious new food; Grug is labeled a zombie after taking the first nap.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part II - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants brain and defeat the nanobots leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants brain cells to the rescue! And when its all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep17
programme.desc: Hush, Little Baby - When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep19
programme.desc: Fugitive's Day Out - Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep18
programme.desc: Night of the Frodarg - On a dark and stormy night, Tim's fears of a local legend and Boss Baby's fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep3
programme.desc: Blade of the Red Phoenix - Po and the kids are recruited to perform in Mei Mei's theatrical show, but things take a turn when Jindiao ruins the play in order to find a mystical scroll

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2
programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays with Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep56
programme.desc: Soutlouts Angels - When Snoutlout crashes on a mysterious island he comes face-to-face with the Wing Maidens and must rely on Astrid, Heather, and Ruffnut to rescue him

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep4
programme.desc: Bad News Bergens / Unhealthy Competition - Poppy signs the Trolls up for a game of Bergenball with the toughest Bergen team aroundSmidge and Guy Diamond face off in a competition for juice dominance.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep56
programme.desc: Bridge On The River Mort - King Julien decides to get his kingdom back; Sage and Clover train with Sage's Master; Mort rallies everyone to build an escape tunnel

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part II - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants brain and defeat the nanobots leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants brain cells to the rescue! And when its all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep17
programme.desc: Hush, Little Baby - When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep19
programme.desc: Fugitive's Day Out - Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep18
programme.desc: Night of the Frodarg - On a dark and stormy night, Tim's fears of a local legend and Boss Baby's fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep3
programme.desc: Blade of the Red Phoenix - Po and the kids are recruited to perform in Mei Mei's theatrical show, but things take a turn when Jindiao ruins the play in order to find a mystical scroll

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2
programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays with Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep56
programme.desc: Soutlouts Angels - When Snoutlout crashes on a mysterious island he comes face-to-face with the Wing Maidens and must rely on Astrid, Heather, and Ruffnut to rescue him

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep4
programme.desc: Bad News Bergens / Unhealthy Competition - Poppy signs the Trolls up for a game of Bergenball with the toughest Bergen team aroundSmidge and Guy Diamond face off in a competition for juice dominance.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep56
programme.desc: Bridge On The River Mort - King Julien decides to get his kingdom back; Sage and Clover train with Sage's Master; Mort rallies everyone to build an escape tunnel

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep59
programme.desc: The Last Stand (Part 1) - As the Paladins inch closer to Earth, alarming revelations of the planet's condition are exposed

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep60
programme.desc: The Last Stand (Part 2) - As a continuation to part 1, more of Earth's details and status are revealed

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep7
programme.desc: The Dark Side of the Moose: Chapter Two - Rocky and Bullwinkle encounter a young alien and set out on a mission to reunite him with his alien family but things get complicated when they accidentally lose him at an alien convention and Boris, Natasha and other eccentric billionaire Colonel Boudreaux are also after him

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep8
programme.desc: The Dark Side of the Moose: Chapter Three - A super-powered Rocky almost defeats Fearless Leader, but accidentally overdoes it, driving Fearless Leader to take his powers into space for the ultimate space take-over-the-world evil plan

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep8
programme.desc: Biggest Fan/ Queen Isabella - Shelby, Peabody & Sherman's biggest fan, accidentally gets sucked into the show; Queen Isabella falls for a scam and loses all her money.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep9
programme.desc: Peabody's Parents/ Galileo - Peabody's non-talking dog parents arrive for an unexpected visit; Galileo makes the world go dark when he crashes his spaceship and breaks the sun.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep19
programme.desc: House Touchers/The Transformation - When Rocksy is accidentally flung inside the humans' house, Berry and Twig go on a wild adventure to bring her back. / Rocksy is upset when she finds out all her friends will evolve, but she will always be a pebble. Rocksy tries various attempts to challenge her nature.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep20
programme.desc: Ice, Ice, Berry/Venomous Bush Viper - After an ice storm coats the yard in the slippery stuff, Leaf convinces the Mighty Ones that their reflections are evil doppelgangers. / When a venomous bush viper swallows Rocksy, the Mighty Ones must venture into the snake's stomach in order to save her.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep30
programme.desc: Galapagos a Go-Go - When Odlulu uses the Become an Animal Key to transform herself into different animals, she accidentally disrupts the Galapagos Islands animal populations. It's up to Wally, Wenda, Edmund and Hillary to protect the Galapagos from Odlulu's creature chaos.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep23
programme.desc: Lucky And The Role Reversal - After Aunt Cora moves out, Lucky tries to live a life without rules.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep24
programme.desc: Disaster Of Puppets / Love Will Eep Us Together - Thunk invents ventriloquism when he tries (and fails) at stand-up comedy, but he gets jealous when Ahhh! Valley thinks the puppet is the real comedian/Eep is determined for two buffalippos to find love when Grug denies her dating privileges.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep23
programme.desc: Shock And Awe - When a new dragon is found in Edge Cove, the Dragon Riders must help the Sea Shocker escape a group of hungry Scauldrons

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep24
programme.desc: Play It Again, Tim - When Tim is forced to take piano lessons, he actually enjoys them and Boss Baby realizes that Tim is being brainwashed by his piano teacher, slowly turning Tim into an old man

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep23
programme.desc: Three Trolls-keteers / The Helper - When a neighbor asks Guy for help to fight a monster, Guy mistakes it as an invite to act in his play/Smidge sets out to help Troll Village but creates disastrous results

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep23
programme.desc: The King Who Would Be King - Fred the Giant Scorpion vows revenge after he reads an untrue story about himself in King Julien's new book.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep23
programme.desc: Stories - Artephius and the orphans are alone in town when a Celtic thunder god demands to be let into the treasure house or he will destroy San Lorenzo!

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep23
programme.desc: Riddle Me This, Egypt - Wally and Wenda accompany Wizard Dustybeard on his latest archaeology expedition: finding the Lost Chamber of Magic Keys. To find the hidden chamber, the Wanderers will have to solve the key's riddles. But Odlulu is on their tail, and when she takes the Riddle Key, the Wanderers must navigate a hidden pyramid full of tricks and traps.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome to Harmony Harbor - Ari moves in to Harmony Harbor, but notices something strange involving a group of kids, a Noodle Truck chef and her pet squirrel. / After Ari discovers the secret of Team Zenko Go, he asks to join the crew. But first he must learn the importance of teamwork.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep23
programme.desc: New Hat, New Tag! / Furry Tail Ending - When Tag worries that she's no longer a "Go" dog, Lady Lydia helps her find a new persona by helping Tag try on a bunch of different hats. Luckily, when a runaway puppy needs to be wrangled, and only the speedy Tag can catch him, Tag realizes she was a Go dog all along. \ Sergeant Pooch reads Scooch, Tag and Kit a story book during their sleepover. But when the last pages are missing, the three kids work together to make up their own ending to the story.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep45
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Anchor - The Ninjas are giving a special display of acrobatics and climbing to Noddy, the Pirates and the Knights. It looks amazing! Noddy goes back to Toy Green to tell Big Ears all about it and narrowly misses being run over by the runaway Pirates Galleon. Someone has taken their sticky anchor and without it they've no way of stopping the ship! Noddy needs to investigate before there's an accident! He follows all the clues which leads him to the Knights. They'd been so impressed by the acrobatics of the Ninjas that they'd borrowed the sticky anchor to help them do acrobatics too! Noddy retrieves the anchor and the Knights apologise for causing such chaos. The Pirates didn't mind though they LOVE racing about. Thanks to Noddy, the case is closed!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep45
programme.desc: Why Puffadder Sheds His Skin - You see there was a time when Puff Adder didn't shed his skin. All the animals were afraid of Puff Adder because he was very difficult to see and he had a nasty bite. Puff Adder decides that if no beast wants to be his friend then he doesn't want to have any friends. He slithers far, far away to the desert where he bumps into Camel and learns that every animal needs a friend. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep45
programme.desc: Crash Landing - Hellie makes an emergency landing. Despite everyone's efforts, Hellie won't fly again what could the problem be?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep19
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Clippy Claws - Pat has a very special delivery today! Micawber's claws need clipping and Pat needs to deliver not only the claw clippers but Amy the vet too! On the way to the lighthouse though they encounter all sorts of animals needing help today from a poorly Bonnie with a cold to a fretful Pumpkin who doesn't want to take his horse pills! Meanwhile, poor Micawber's claws are so long and he's so upset by getting them tangled up in things like Chris's scarf and the lighthouse tablecloth that he flies out of the window, carrying the tangled lighthouse keys in his claws! Chris tries to get them back and finds himself locked out of the lighthouse altogether! Luckily, Pat and Amy arrive in the SDS helicopter. Pat lowers Amy down to Micawber who is perched on top of the lighthouse and she's soon able to clip his claws and retrieve the keys. Phew! Well done Amy and well done Pat!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep46
programme.desc: The Case Of The Disappearing Traffic Cones - When the Builders' traffic cones disappear from their building site, there is chaos all over Brickabuild. Noddy decides to investigate right away and find out who's taken them. Did the Naughticorns take them for their obstacle course? Or was it Farmer Tom who used them to keep his animals under control. Noddy carefully follows the clues and at last discovers it was the Pirates who took them to use as markers for Stripes' Pirate Galleon Driving Test. Noddy tells them about the traffic chaos and the contrite pirates return the cones at once. Best of all Pirate Stripes has passed her test! Well done Noddy, case closed!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep46
programme.desc: Why Eagle Rules The Skies - You see there was a time when Eagle didn't rule the skies. She was a humble bird who kept herself to self. But then one day things start going wrong for the birds - some beast steals Hen's eggs, Hummingbird loses her hum and Tickbird goes missing! Eagle quietly saves the day and Lion rewards her with half his Kingdom. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep46
programme.desc: Plugger's New Job - James has broken down so Mama Mia comandeers Plugger to run her about. Mama Mia has a wonderful time with Plugger and James is jealous. He tries to remedy the situation with disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep20
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Sorting Machine - Pat and Jess are called to Cardiff to collect a new sorting machine when the Pencaster machine breaks down. Whilst they negotiate with Rowena Roberts, the Cardiff sorting office manager, as to how to move the heavy machine onto the SDS plane, Ben is fighting his own battles at the Pencaster office as his merry band of helpers from the village cause more chaos in their attempts to sort the post!After a quick tour of Gilbertson Castle, Pat and Jess manage to get the new sorting machine to Pencaster just in time to deliver a missing birthday present to Meera. Happy Birthday Meera and well done, Postman Pat!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep5
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep31
programme.desc: Slamtools - Garby and Click-Clack must rescue the Dinotruxafter they are tied down by a destructive tribe of Slamtools who made an evil deal with D-Structs

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep31
programme.desc: Treasure Of The Sierra Marty/Big Baby - Chet, Skidmark and Smoove Move bring swamp toad Marty on an adventure; The snails fumble taking care of a lost human child left at the taco stand.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep31
programme.desc: Hard To Gettings / Tummy Fish - After Oh goes on a date with Sharzod, she wants to be in a serious relationship; When the parasites who live in Oh's tummy emerge, Tip is surprised to discover that she is a celebrity to them.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep15
programme.desc: Lucky And The New Governor - The girls plans to attend the Governors Ball are waylaid when they save a pregnant horse.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep16
programme.desc: Lucky And The Risky Rescue - When a Tuckapaw boy is unfairly arrested, Lucky and her friends plan to break him out of jail.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep11
programme.desc: Friday Night Liyotes - When Grug won't let her join his winning team, Eep forms her own underdog team in the first-ever sports competition Ahhh! Valley's annual Egg Toss.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep12
programme.desc: The Crood Who Knew Too Much / Scent Of A Thunk - When Thunk is so stinky he kills animals with his stench, he pretends to be a great hunter; A spider ant bite gives Grug the biggest brain in town.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep139
programme.desc: The Museum - Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep130
programme.desc: Babysitting - Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig look after Peppa and George while Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig go out for the evening. Peppa and George are too excited to sleep and Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig play games with them to tire them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep131

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep132

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep159
programme.desc: The Stay Over - When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything they can to get him to stop (without disturbing his nap) and when they try to get Bubu's help, but Ron snores louder and louder!!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep160
programme.desc: Snow Dream - Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep307
